alert.note: Alert for Minnehaha (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 7:53AM MDT until April 12 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa... Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90 affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Brookings and Moody Counties. Big Sioux River at Akron affecting Union and Plymouth Counties. ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in South Dakota... Iowa... Big Sioux River above Hawarden affecting Lincoln, Sioux and Union Counties. .Snow melt and increased reservoir releases will cause the river flows to become high. Expect minor flooding downstream from the dam. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, significant amounts of agricultural lands are flooded through the basin, and the park in Dell Rapids begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 13.1 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Big Sioux River Dell Rapids 12.0 11.7 Sun 8 am 13.1 12.6 11.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 1100 AM CDT.
